questions.question: 1. What is the purpose of conducting meta-testing in your assessment process?
2. How do you categorize and manage responses for meta-testing questions about assessment structure?
3. Why did you choose to use a select type question for assessing familiarity with meta-testing concepts?
4. What is the preferred method for handling user feedback during meta-testing?
5. How do you ensure the clarity and relevance of the questions in your meta-testing process?
6. How do you categorize and manage defects identified during testing?
7. How are responses managed and analyzed for each type of meta-testing question in your assessment?
8. What factors influenced the design of the meta-testing question format to optimize understanding and accuracy of responses?
9. Which of the following methods do you use to validate and verify software functionality?
10. What strategies are employed to analyze and interpret the data collected from meta-testing questions effectively?

summary.pass: Congratulations! You have passed the assessment with a score of {score}. Keep up the great work!
summary.fail: Unfortunately, you did not pass the assessment. Your score is {score}. Please review the areas for improvement and try again.
